summary.span: 创建多选复选框组，该复选框组可以通过将控件绑定到数据源动态创建。

span.span: Creates a multi selection check box group that can be dynamically created by binding the control to a data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#Introduction) - [指定列表布局Specifying List Layout](#SpecifyingListLayout) - [指定列表项Specifying List Items](#SpecifyingListItems) - [辅助功能Accessibility](#Accessibility) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## 介绍Introduction 控件提供一个多选复选框组，该复选框组可以通过数据绑定动态生成。The control provides a multi selection check box group that can be dynamically generated with data binding. 它包含 与列表中的各个项对应的成员的集合。It contains an collection with members corresponding to individual items in the list. 若要确定哪些项已选中，请循环访问集合，并测试 列表中每个项的属性。To determine which items are checked, iterate through the collection and test the property of each item in the list. > [!NOTE] > 你还可以使用多个 控件。You can also use multiple controls. 使用数据绑定可以更轻松地创建一组复选框，而单个控件可以更 好地控制布局。The control is easier for creating a set of check boxes using data binding, while the individual control gives you greater control over layout. ## 指定列表布局Specifying List Layout 您可以使用和属性来指定显示列表的方式 。You can specify the way the list is displayed by using the and properties. 有关布局选项的信息，请参阅 枚举。For information about layout options, see the enumeration. 默认情况下， 设置为 `RepeatDirection.Vertical`。By default, is set to `RepeatDirection.Vertical`. 将此属性设置为 `RepeatDirection.Horizontal` 水平呈现列表。Setting this property to `RepeatDirection.Horizontal` renders the list horizontally. 某些 设置不允许水平布局。Some settings do not allow horizontal layout. 有关详细信息，请参见 枚举。For more information, see the enumeration. ## 指定列表项Specifying List Items 若要指定要在控件中显示的项 ，请在 `ListItem` 控件的开始和结束标记之间放置每个项的元素 。To specify items that you want to appear in the control, place a `ListItem` element for each entry between the opening and closing tags of the control. 该 控件还支持数据绑定。The control also supports data binding. 若要将控件绑定到数据源，请首先创建一个数据源（如其中一个 对象），其中包含要在控件中显示的项。To bind the control to a data source, first create a data source, such as one of the objects, that contains the items to display in the control. 接下来，使用 方法将数据源绑定到 控件。Next, use the method to bind the data source to the control. 使用 和 属性来指定数据源中要绑定到 `Text` `Value` 控件中每个列表项的和属性的字段。Use the and properties to specify which field in the data source to bind to the `Text` and `Value` properties of each list item in the control, respectively. 控件现在将显示数据源中的信息。The control will now display the information from the data source. 若要确定控件中的选定项 ，请循环访问 集合，并测试 集合中每个项的属性。To determine the selected items in the control, iterate through the collection and test the property of each item in the collection. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件可用于显示用户输入，其中可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 在应用程序中显示可执行脚本、SQL 语句或其他代码之前，请检查从该客户端发送的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 您可以使用验证控件在显示控件中的输入文本之前验证用户输入。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供输入请求验证功能来阻止用户输入中的脚本和 HTML。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [保护标准控件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178270(v=vs.100))， [如何：通过将 HTML 编码应用到字符串](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/a2a4yykt(v=vs.100))，并 [在 ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/7kh55542(v=vs.100))来防范 Web 应用程序中的脚本攻击。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178270(v=vs.100)), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/a2a4yykt(v=vs.100)), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/7kh55542(v=vs.100)). ## 可访问性Accessibility 有关如何配置此控件以生成符合辅助功能标准的标记的信息，请参阅 [Visual Studio 中的辅助功能和 ASP.NET](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms228004(v=vs.140)) 和 [ASP.NET 控件和辅助功能](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms227996(v=vs.140))。For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms228004(v=vs.140)) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms227996(v=vs.140)). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ```              ``` ## Examples 本主题提供了包含源代码的 Visual Studio 网站项目： [下载](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=191890)。A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=191890). 下面的代码示例演示如何 在网页上创建控件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control on a Web page. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性可控制单元的内容与控件中单元格的边框之间的间距 。Use this property to control the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border in the control. 指定的填充量将添加到单元格的所有四个边，其中包含控件中最高单元格和最大宽度的高度 。The padding amount specified is added to all four sides of a cell with the height of the tallest cell and width of the widest cell in the control. 生成的单元大小统一应用于控件中的所有单元格 。The resulting cell size is applied uniformly to all cells in the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性指定控件的单元格边距 为5像素。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that the cell padding for the control is 5 pixels. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code samples use the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将每个代码示例复制到具有 .aspx 扩展名的空文本文件中。Each code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要由从类派生的自定义控件中的控件开发人员使用 。The method is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the class. 方法指示控件的状态是否 已更改。The method indicates whether the state of the control has changed. 换句话说，它确定控件中的每个列表项是否具有 与上一个已发布值相同的值。In other words, it determines whether each list item in the control has the same value as the last posted value. 用户在控件中选择或清除项会更改 控件集合中相应对象的属性值 。A user selecting or clearing an item in the control changes the property value for the corresponding object in the collection of the control. 如果在控件中选择了同一列表项，或者如果 禁用，则 返回 `false` 。If the same list items are selected in the control, or if the is disabled, returns `false`. 当 方法 `true` 为控件返回时，页框架将 为控件调用方法。When the method returns `true` for a control, the page framework invokes the method for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性可指定控件的显示方向 。Use this property to specify the display direction of the control. > [!NOTE] > 显示的列数始终由 属性确定。The number of columns that are displayed is always determined by the property. 如果将此属性设置为 `RepeatDirection.Vertical` ，并且属性设置为，则将 从上到下填充第一列，然后填充第二列，直到呈现所有项。If this property is set to `RepeatDirection.Vertical` and if the property is set to , the first column is filled from top to bottom, then the next column, and so on until all items are rendered. 例如，如果将 属性设置为，则 `3` 控件中的项 将显示为三列，如下表所示。For example, if the property is set to `3`, the items in the control are displayed in three columns, as in the following table. |||| |-|-|-| |11|44|77| |22|55|88| |33|66|99| 如果将此属性设置为 `RepeatDirection.Horizontal` ，并且属性设置为，则将 从上到下填充第一列，然后填充第二列，直到呈现所有项。If this property is set to `RepeatDirection.Horizontal` and if the property is set to , the first column is filled from top to bottom, then the next column, and so on until all items are rendered. 例如，如果将 属性设置为，则 `3` 控件的项将 显示在每个项的各行中，如下表所示。For example, if the property is set to `3`, the items of the control are displayed in rows of three items each, as in the following table. |||| |-|-|-| |11|22|33| |44|55|66| |77|88|99| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置 属性以指定显示方向是垂直的。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property to specify that the display direction is vertical. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code samples use the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将每个代码示例复制到具有 .aspx 扩展名的空文本文件中。Each code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). value.span: 默认值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性可指定与复选框关联的文本是否显示在复选框的左侧或右侧。Use this property to specify whether the text associated with the check boxes appears on the left or right of the check box. 如果将此属性设置为 `TextAlign.Right` ，则该文本将显示在复选框的右侧。If this property is set to `TextAlign.Right`, the text is displayed to the right of the check box. 如果将此属性设置为 `TextAlign.Left` ，则该文本将显示在复选框的左侧。If this property is set to `TextAlign.Left`, the text is displayed to the left of the check box. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性指定与复选框关联的文本显示在控件的右侧 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that the text associated with the check boxes appears on the right side of the control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code samples use the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将每个代码示例复制到具有 .aspx 扩展名的空文本文件中。Each code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)).
